Title: Relates to discovery of the plaintiff's medical records in a personal injury action
Summary: Relates to discovery of the plaintiff's medical records in a personal injury action; provides that medical records are material and necessary to the defense of a personal injury action if they reasonably relate to the injuries or limitations claimed by the plaintiff in the action.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to discovery of the plaintiff's medical records in a personal injury action
